name: GitaQuotes
0:
”Alexa, open Gita Quotes”
”Alexa, start Gita Quotes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gita quotes
des:
Disclaimer
Start your day with an inspirational list of quotes. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
Gita Quotes will help you to live your life without getting frightened. It will motivate you to live your life fluently. The motive of this app is to spread the positivity and good things among the people. Get to know our religion, our culture, our belief. Connect with our religion and let's make this world a place of peace!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
